sections.name: Thievery
sections.description:
To gain money and rare loots!
Be careful you might get arrested!

sections.name: Mining
sections.description: To get mineral and stones which can be used for crafting or directly sell the product

sections.name: Scavenger Hunter
sections.description: Find loots through random places which can be used for crafting or directly sell the item

sections.name: Watching movies
sections.description: Watching random movies can get you random boost depends on what film you watch

sections.name: Attend musical event
sections.description: Attending musical event can get you random boost

sections.name: Get or extend driving license
sections.description: If you already have driving license you only can get extended license

sections.name: Medical Checkup
sections.description: Seek professional medicare help to check if you have disease, this not include medical treatment unless you go to hospital
